title: How has the use of the Internet changed the lives of housewives all around the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: As we all know that due to Internet world has become closer to us. Right from work to shopping everything can be done because of Internet technology. For housewives, internet is useful in many ways.. Some of them are listed below: Daily soaps or any other show can be watched.New recipes can be learned through YouTubeMovies and songs can be downloaded, watched for entertainmentAny new activity like yoga can be learned by watching online classesShe can do freelance work and can earn money too.So these are the productive uses of internet for housewives. Because of this, she won't get bored at home and can also start her career by doing a new start up of her business. Therefore, the definition of housewives have changed. They are not just cooking and looking after children, they can do many things just by a single click.

Buisness, vloging, gardening techniques, cooking recipes, starting pages about awareness, ofcourse connecting with their long lost friends through social media… etc there are many things. Not just housewives, internet has changed many people's lives. It basically shrunk our world into our palms. Using it wisely and thoughtfully is what matters.
